description: Mint Almond Wheat Bread. A nice dense bread made with mint and almonds. Vegan Recipe.
keywords: everyday bread recipe, nut bread, vegan bread recipe
name: Mint Almond Wheat Bread
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup almonds (soaked in warm water for an hour or more)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the cracked wheat in water for an hour and then Boil the cracked wheat till it softens (3-4 minutes).
Let the mixture cool a bit then add Yeast and sugar to it.
Let it sit for 10 minutes or until frothy.
In a blender, add the mint leaves, soaked almonds and ginger and blend coarsely. Add some water if needed.
In a greased mixing bowl, add the flours and salt and mix well.
Add the oil, yeast mixture and mint mixture and 1/2 cup (125ml) of water and knead for 8-10 minutes. ( if using stand mixer, 3-4 minute batches with intermittent scraping)
Place dough in a well greased container, covered in a warm place for 2 hours.
Lightly punch the dough and using a little flour knead and shape into a loaf by pulling on all sides and tucking under.
Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with damp towel. Let rise for an hour.
Bake at 375 degrees F for about 40 minutes.
